testimonial: Selby was fatally shot after he robbed a business at knifepoint and continued to approach officers while armed, according to police. Authorities said an officer tried to stop Selby with a Taser before he was shot.

Sellinger's wife called police to report that he was missing before officers found him in a roadway, authorities said. Sellinger had allegedly tried to carjack a motorist and assaulted a motorcyclist before police arrived. According to officials, Sellinger fought with a deputy and ignored his commands. Sellinger went into medical distress after police said the deputy shocked him twice with a Taser and sprayed him with pepper spray, and he died the next day. Sellinger was a military veteran, and neighbors said he was diagnosed with post-traumatic stress disorder.
Tylka killed his estranged wife before dying in a shootout with law enforcement, authorities said. A state trooper was seriously injured in the exchange of gunfire.

Two people called 911 to report that Jacques was driving erratically, police said. During a traffic stop, Jacques 'did not cooperate', and an officer shocked him with a Taser before he was fatally shot, according to authorities.

Authorities were responding to a report of a domestic disturbance and found King standing in a doorway armed with two guns, police said. Officers said they fatally shot her when she pointed one gun toward them and refused to lower it.
